## Marker.setDrawer() method

Sets the object in charge of drawing the marker.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDrawer(drawer: MarkerSvg): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  drawer | MarkerSvg | The object in charge of drawing the marker. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
